title: Hildr.Quest.question
body:
What is it you intend to do?

[[Monrjiall.Quest.revenge]]

title: Monrjiall.Quest.revenge
body:
I shall climb to Asgard itself and make my axe decide their fate, as they decided mine.

[[Hildr.Quest.unwise]]

title: Hildr.Quest.unwise
body:
That may not be a wise thing to do. 
The gods are powerful and ever watchful... 
...ready to dispose of any they deem as potential threats.

[[Monrjiall.Quest.question]]

title: Monrjiall.Quest.question
body:
Then what am I to do? I cannot sit and do nothing about this.

[[Hildr.Quest.valor]]

title: Hildr.Quest.valor
body:
Nor should you. 
There’s still a way for you to enter Valhalla. 
You will have to prove your valor and worth by performing three tasks.

[[Monrjiall.Quest.easy]]

title: Monrjiall.Quest.easy
body:
In that case, I will be in Valhalla in no time. 
I have more valor and worth than anyone here. 
I’ll get right to it!

[[Hildr.Quest.but]]

title: Monrjiall.Quest.off
body:
Off I go!
...
This river is blocking my way!
Cursed Gods!
Stop trying to hinder my way at every turn!

[[Hildr.Quest.creek]]

title: Hildr.Quest.creek
body:
Uhm...
That's just a creek, I don't think the gods... 
I mean...
Nevermind.
You will need to create some sort of bridge to cross over that creek.

[[Monrjiall.Quest.noBridge]]

title: Monrjiall.Quest.noBridge
body:
But there are no bridges here!

[[Hildr.Quest.LookAround]]

title: Hildr.Quest.LookAround
body:
I'll tell you what.
Look around for a bit...
See if you can come up with something to get through the creek.
If you're still out of ideas then, come talk to me again...
And I will give you my aid.

<<set $introFinished to true>>
